translation: Wherever they are born, they meet the Buddhas, And assemble with the saints and sages.

source_sentence: 常生厭離五欲心，　　能於佛法信出家，
translation: Being always disillusioned with the five desires, they’re able to believe in the Buddha’s teaching and leave home.

source_sentence: 即於見時獲斯利，　　亦得餘利未盡說。
translation: That is, they attain this benefit when they see it, and they also attain other benefits that haven't been explained in detail.

source_sentence: 是等大士諸功德，　　若欲稱揚無窮盡。
translation: If you want to praise the virtues of these great men, they'll never end.

source_sentence: 若有女人以信心，　　聞是菩薩大莊嚴，
translation: If there is a woman with faith Who hears this great adornment of enlightenment,

source_sentence: 永不復受女人身，　　必為眾生無上尊。
translation: They'll never again receive a woman's body, and they'll surely be the unsurpassed honored one among sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若有男子若女人，　　聞其名稱心歡喜，
translation: If there are men or women, They will hear their names and hearts rejoice.

source_sentence: 發願欲見此菩薩，　　身壞命終即生彼。
translation: Wishing to see this bodhisattva, he'll be born there when his body breaks up and his life ends.

source_sentence: 若諸男女餘眾生，　　聞此菩薩大功德，
translation: If men, women, and other sentient beings hear the great virtues of this enlightening being,

source_sentence: 能以淨心信樂者，　　即於菩提不退轉。
translation: Those who can believe and rely on the pure mind, that is, those who don't regress from enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生入法位，　　聞此菩薩奇特名，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who enter the state of truth, They hear this enlightening being’s extraordinary name.

source_sentence: 是人雖不得佛道，　　亦獲無量諸功德。
translation: Even though this person hasn't attained the Buddha Way, they'll still attain measureless merit.

source_sentence: 如有藥樹名喜見，　　能療眾生百千病，
translation: Just as a tree of medicine called “joy-view” Can cure the sicknesses of hundreds of thousands of living beings,

source_sentence: 周迴皆去一由旬，　　災火猛焰所不燒，
translation: Each circumference is one yojana away, not burned by a blazing fire.

source_sentence: 若諸毒虫入其內，　　毒氣即時皆消歇。
translation: If poisonous insects enter them, Their poisonous energy immediately vanishes.

source_sentence: 若聞此樹香氣熏，　　即便悶絕喪其身，
translation: If someone hears the fragrance of this tree, They'll faint and lose their body.

source_sentence: 根莖枝葉及華實，　　寂然無作無所為。
translation: Roots, stems, branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits— Quiet, unconstructed, not doing anything.

source_sentence: 而其勢力能有用，　　皆悉消滅諸毒害，
translation: Yet their power can be useful To extinguish all poisons and harms.

source_sentence: 此樹遠能消眾病，　　況取根莖而服用！
translation: From a distance, this tree can subdue all illnesses, How much more so when it takes its roots and stems and drinks them!

source_sentence: 是大菩薩亦如是，　　十方聞名作佛事，
translation: This great enlightening being is also like this: All the buddha-workers in the ten directions hear names and do buddha-work.

source_sentence: 況得目見加供養，　　親近諮問決所疑。」
translation: How much more so when they're given an eye-view to make offerings, become intimate with them and consult them to resolve their doubts.

source_sentence: 時佛所現化阿難，　　即復加敬問世尊：
translation: The Buddha then manifested his transformation to Ānanda, who again respectfully asked the Bhagavān,

source_sentence: 「如佛所說大菩薩，　　能以名聞作佛事，
translation: Just as the Buddha has taught that great enlightening beings Can do buddha-work by means of names and sounds,

source_sentence: 娑婆世界有是不？　　唯願世尊為我說。」
translation: Is there anything wrong with the sahā world? Please, World-honored One, explain it to me.”

source_sentence: 佛言：「我壽不久留，　　今此眾生福微淺，
諸佛菩提甚難信，　　如來所說深無極。
translation: The enlightenment of the Buddhas is hard to believe— What the Enlightened Ones teach is profound and boundless.

source_sentence: 阿難當知有菩薩，　　今現在此大會中，
translation: Ānanda, you should know that there are bodhisattvas who are now present in this great assembly.

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩大莊嚴，　　十方諸佛讚不盡。
translation: These are the great adornments of enlightening beings; The Buddhas of the ten directions praise them without end.

source_sentence: 阿難觀是跋陀婆，　　又觀寶積法寶積，
translation: Ānanda observed Bhadrapāla, And also observed the accumulation of treasures and the accumulation of doctrine.

source_sentence: 導師智者及星得，　　并婆羅門那羅達；
translation: The Guide, the wise one and the star-attainers, As well as the brahmans and brāhmaṇas.

source_sentence: 又觀帝德善比丘，　　婆樓那天婆羅(丹樓)那，
translation: Furthermore, the monk Kauṇḍinya was a virtuous bhikṣu, and the brāhmaṇa Vārāṇasī brahma (dāna),

source_sentence: 亦觀善力大比丘，　　是等行願難思議。
translation: He also observes the great monk Sunetra, whose practice and vows are inconceivable.

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩稱不虛，　　皆發不虛大莊嚴，
translation: These enlightening beings, called “not false,” All give rise to the great adornment of not falsehood.

source_sentence: 若有見者尚獲利，　　況復親近受教誨！
translation: If someone sees it, they'll still benefit, so why wouldn't they become intimate with and receive instruction?

source_sentence: 若有眾生得見者，　　或復聞其大名稱，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who get to see it, Or hear its great fame,

source_sentence: 則於佛道無所疑，　　常不復墮諸惡趣。
translation: Then they have no doubts about the Buddha’s path And never again fall into evil rebirths.

source_sentence: 常能發行勤精進，　　能善修集真智慧，
translation: They are always able to produce diligent effort, Able to skillfully cultivate true knowledge.

source_sentence: 常能安住淨持戒，　　能深志樂無上乘。
translation: Being always able to abide in pure observance of precepts, they can deeply aspire to the unsurpassed vehicle.

source_sentence: 阿難！所有十方界，　　諸佛世尊今現在，
translation: Ānanda, all the buddhas and world-honored ones of the ten directions are now present.

source_sentence: 皆共稱揚是菩薩，　　所發莊嚴大誓願。
translation: They all together praised this bodhisattva’s Adornment of great vows.

source_sentence: 稱讚是等廣名聞，　　令餘菩薩生貴心，
translation: Praising such extensive fame Causing other enlightening beings to give rise to noble aspirations.

source_sentence: 皆言欲見釋迦尊，　　及諸具足莊嚴者。
translation: They all say they want to see the honored Śākyamuni and those who are fully adorned.

source_sentence: 即時諸佛皆聽許，　　各禮佛足敬遶已，
translation: The buddhas immediately agreed, bowed their heads at the Buddha’s feet, and circumambulated him.

source_sentence: 於彼佛土沒不現，　　皆來到此娑婆界。
translation: In that buddha land, they don't appear and all come to this sahā realm.

source_sentence: 聞是菩薩具足願，　　於無上道轉精進，
translation: They hear that these enlightening beings have fulfilled their vows And are engaged in the unexcelled path of liberation.

source_sentence: 如來即記當成佛，　　國土壽量號如是。
translation: The Tathāgata then predicts that he'll become a buddha, and so is the lifespan of his land and name.

source_sentence: 此等無量無數劫，　　所有不善業因緣，
translation: These are the causes and conditions of unwholesome actions For countless, immeasurable eons.

source_sentence: 以是行業因緣故，　　與我生此濁世中。
translation: Because of the causes and conditions of their actions, they're born with me in this turbid world.

source_sentence: 我今雖得無上道，　　猶不喜見未來世，
translation: Although I have now attained the highest path, I still don’t like to see future lives.

source_sentence: 當有破戒諸比丘，　　急性惡口麁獷言。
translation: Suppose there are monks who break the precepts and speak harshly with a sense of urgency.

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩聞此事，　　而加精進大莊嚴，
translation: These enlightening beings, hearing about this matter, Are greatly adorned by their exertion.

source_sentence: 於飢饉中行大施，　　法欲壞時演真教。
translation: They practice great giving in the midst of hunger, and when the Dharma is about to break down, they expound true teachings.

source_sentence: 今於佛前發誓言，　　我要當以無上法，
translation: I now make this vow before the Buddha:

source_sentence: 於後恐怖惡世中，　　不惜身命利眾生。
translation: In the future fearful and evil world, they won't spare their lives to save sentient beings.

source_sentence: 但發是願尚為難，　　況能成就如願行！
translation: But to make such a vow is still difficult, How much the more difficult it is to fulfill what one wishes!

source_sentence: 如是等經及持者，　　於惡世中被輕賤。
translation: Such scriptures and their holders will be despised in a bad world.

source_sentence: 阿難觀彼顛倒世，　　聞如是等諸經法，
translation: Ānanda observed that world, which was in error. Hearing the teachings of all these scriptures,

source_sentence: 於是中生非法想，　　皆言是法非佛說。
translation: They then give rise to thoughts of non-dharma, saying it's a teaching that's not taught by the Buddha.

source_sentence: 以我菩提得供養，　　而便勤造破法緣，
translation: Because they honor my enlightenment, they diligently create the conditions for destroying all doctrines.

source_sentence: 如是甚惡濁亂世，　　誰能堪忍住是中？」
translation: Such a world is so bad and turbid that who can tolerate it?

source_sentence: 斯人從佛聞是語，　　即時悲泣淚交流，
translation: When those people heard these words from the Buddha, They immediately wept and wailed in sorrow.

source_sentence: 念佛曠劫所修集，　　此法如何便散滅！
translation: Mindfulness of Buddha cultivated over a long eon, how could this dharma be dispersed?

source_sentence: 時諸學人生厭心，　　覺了有為無定相，
translation: The students then became disillusioned, perceiving that conditioned things have no set characteristics.

source_sentence: 如救頭然勤精進，　　漏盡無餘得涅槃。
translation: Like someone who rescues their hair and diligently exerts effort, they'll end the contaminants and attain nirvāṇa without remainder.

source_sentence: 諸天神聞惡世中，　　正法毀滅皆憂慼：
translation: Gods and goddesses hear that in evil worlds The true teaching is destroyed, and all are grieved:

source_sentence: 「我等寧於今命終，　　勿見如是法壞時。
translation: At the end of our lives now, We should not see such a time when the Dharma breaks down.

source_sentence: 我等今見如世尊，　　能大法施無畏者，
translation: We now see the World-Honored One as one who bestows the great dharma on those who are fearless.

source_sentence: 此等現前瞻仰佛，　　聽說甚深無礙法。
translation: These are all presently gazing at the Buddha and listening to the profound, unobstructed teaching.

source_sentence: 又見比丘修諸禪，　　定慧神通悉究竟，
translation: He also saw the monks practicing meditation, Perfecting concentration, wisdom, and mystic powers.

source_sentence: 於後惡世法壞時，　　此等賢聖難復見。
translation: When the dharmas of later evil worlds break down, it's difficult for these good men and sages to see them again.

source_sentence: 諸惡比丘反熾盛，　　持淨戒者無勢力，
translation: The evil bhikṣus are again prevalent, but those who keep the pure precepts have no power.

source_sentence: 乃不得暫止塔廟。」　　時諸天神大憂惱，
translation: So they cannot temporarily stay in the stupa or shrine.” The gods and goddesses were greatly distressed.

source_sentence: 皆悲呼言：「奈何哉！　　佛法毀滅甚可惜。
translation: They all cried out in distress, “What a pity that the Buddha’s teaching has been destroyed!

source_sentence: 佛為是等修苦行，　　而為惡人所輕毀。
translation: Because the Buddha cultivates such ascetic practices, he's despised by bad people.

source_sentence: 自共朋黨相親友，　　誹謗善人生過咎，
translation: They associate with friends and relatives, denigrate the faults of good people, and blame them.

source_sentence: 自言佛是我等師，　　而違佛意毀正法。
translation: They claim that the Buddha is our teacher, Yet they disparage the true-dharma contrary to the Buddha’s teaching.

source_sentence: 與清信女為因緣，　　共結要誓同事業，
translation: Together with a woman of pure faith as their cause, they form the essential vow to work together.

source_sentence: 并心共毀我正法，　　於佛法中無敬心。
translation: They all denigrate my true teaching with their minds, and they have no respect for the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 是眾惡等毀三寶，　　為諸賢聖所遠離，
translation: These various evils and so forth disparage the Three Treasures, Being abandoned by the wise and saintly.

source_sentence: 如兇逸牛角峯利，　　則為眾人之所避。
translation: They're like the bold ox horns and sharp peaks, which are avoided by people.

source_sentence: 於爾時世惡比丘，　　而反輕笑修善者，
translation: At the time, bad monks in the world laughed at those who cultivated goodness.

source_sentence: 來世當有是顛倒，　　應生厭離莫放逸。
translation: In the future there will be such errors, so they should become disillusioned and leave without heedlessness.

source_sentence: 於佛法中勤精進，　　勿見如是濁亂世，
translation: You should exert yourself diligently in the practice of enlightenment, Seeing that all worlds are not like this turbid and confused.

source_sentence: 莫與此等相值遇，　　與此同止甚苦惱。」
translation: Don't meet these people, and they'll be together with them in great pain and suffering.

source_sentence: 時會四眾怪未曾有，是眾蓮華遶佛三匝，於佛前住，各說一偈，稱揚如來及菩薩言：佛說華手經卷第四
translation: The fourfold assembly of the monks wondered at this unprecedented occurrence. These lotus flowers circled the Buddha three times and, standing before him, each uttered one verse in praise of the Tathāgata and bodhisatt
